name: BYPASS (MegaProgramGuy)
description:
BYPASS is a puzzle game I've been working on for a little while. In this game, you cannot move to adjacent empty tiles as you would expect, and instead your only means of movement are by warping to the other side of a series of wall tiles. Note that you cannot warp off of the level.

There are currently 25 levels, and any ideas for future levels or mechanics would be greatly appreciated! :)
